title: GUJARAT TECHNOLOGICAL UNIVERSITY
sub-heading:
NATIONAL SERVICE SCHEME
VISHWAKARMA GOVERNMENT ENGINEERING COLLEGE, CHANDKHEDA
NSS  VGEC
NARAYANI
26march to 29th march 2023

title: NARAYANI Event Overview
content:
Under India's G-20 presidency, institutions organize various events. The NSS unit of VGEC organized "NARAYANI" from 26th March to 29th March 2023.

The main objective was to spread awareness about women’s rights and gender equality. 

Competitions included poem writing, rangoli making, quiz, debate, elocution, etc.  

Students from across the state participated, contributing to the successful spread of awareness.

title: NSS VGEC NARAYANI Event
content: Event held to promote women's rights and gender equality during March 2023.

title: DAY - 1
sub_heading:
Highlighting the 'NUKKAD NATAK' Performance
Raising Awareness on Women's Empowerment

title: 'NUKKAD NATAK' Details
content:
The NSS team performed 'NUKKAD NATAK' with 60+ volunteers.

The drama aimed to encourage women’s empowerment.

Volunteers depicted issues like dowry and inequality, showing how women face challenges and limited opportunities.

title: Event Key Takeaways
content:
➢ Awareness of women’s Empowerment

➢ To understand women’s problems

➢ Performance of Nukkad Natak

title: Glimpses of the 'NUKKAD NATAK'
content: Drama team performing at the riverfront and various other locations.

title: Quiz and Poem Writing
sub-heading:
State-level 'NARAYANI' event by NSS team.
Poem and Quiz Competition.

title: Quiz & Poem Competition Details
content:
In the Quiz competition, participants wrote poems on given topics.
Questions covered women entrepreneurs, G-20, women empowerment awareness.
Quiz helped gain general knowledge.
Poem writing improved writing skills.

Content/Discussion Points:

* Improvement in writing skills and mental ability.
* Quiz helps in overall participation development and general knowledge.
* Promoting the thought of women’s empowerment.

title: Glimpses of the "Event"
content:
Photographs showcasing the Quiz and Poem Writing Competition. Participants engaged and enthusiastic.
Celebrating creativity and knowledge.

title: Quiz
content: Image depicting a quiz competition in progress. Participants are seen answering questions related to social awareness.

title: Day 3
sub_heading:
Debate and Rangoli Competition: NSS Team's Initiative 
Focused on Women Empowerment and Gender Equality.
Promoting Awareness and Skill Development.

title: Debate & Rangoli Competition Details
content:
Rangoli competition showcased freehand skills on colors with the theme of women empowerment.
The debate covered topics related to women’s empowerment and gender equality.

Through debate, people gained knowledge about the current scenario of women’s empowerment in India.

Content/Discussion Points:

* Colors are joyous, they teach us to be happy, and so do rangoli.
* Debate helped to understand the problems of women and solutions to deal with them.
* These competitions helped participants in their overall development.

title: Event Glimpses
content:
Photographs from the Debate and Rangoli competition.
Participants showcase their Rangoli artwork related to women empowerment.

title: Rangoli
content: Rangoli Designs created by participants at the event, with a theme of Women Empowerment.

title: DAY - 4
sub-heading:
ELOCUTION COMPETITION AND ENDING CEREMONY
So, With this, we came to an end of the event "NARAYANI" with the last sub-events as Elocution and the Ending ceremony.

title: Elocution Competition
content:
In Elocution, participants were given topics to give a speech on and the topics covered the motive to spread awareness of empowering women and support.

Students participated with enthusiasm and gave their best speeches.

title: Ending Ceremony
content:
In the ending ceremony, Winners got awarded certificates and prizes. Faculties involved in the event "NARAYANI", who gave their precious time by judging the competitions were also given a thank gift.

And this event " NARAYANI " got accomplished with the National Anthem.

title: Content/Discussion Points of the “Event”
content:
➢▪ By the Elocution, people got to understand more about the thoughts of empowering women

➢▪ This event is not just a boundary, supporting women’s choice and making their voice rise is the moto which is a non-stopping phase, that everyone should know

➢▪ At last, every woman is doing her best, so never discourage their spirit
